name: Keto Green Bean Snack
ingredients: 16 ounce package frozen whole green beans, do not thaw
utensils: Plastic bag or container for shaking

instructions.en: Preheat oven to 275°F (135°C) and line a large baking sheet with heavy foil
instructions.sk: Predhrejte rúru na 135°C a vyložte veľký plech na pečenie ťažkou fóliou
instructions.ja: オーブンを275°F（135°C）に予熱し、大きなベーキングシートに厚手のアルミホイルを敷く

instructions.en: Cut open the bag of frozen green beans and pour in the oil. Close the bag and shake to coat the beans completely
instructions.sk: Otvorte vrecko mrazených zelených fazuliek a nalejte do neho olej. Vrecko zatvorte a pretrepte, aby sa fazuľky úplne obalili
instructions.ja: 冷凍インゲンの袋を開け、油を注ぐ。袋を閉じて振り、インゲンに油を均一にコーティングする

instructions.en: Pour the oil-coated green beans onto the prepared baking sheet
instructions.sk: Nalejte olejom obalené zelené fazuľky na pripravený plech na pečenie
instructions.ja: 油をまぶしたインゲンを準備したベーキングシートに広げる

instructions.en: Bake for 1 1/2 to 2 hours or until the beans are very dark and crisp, but not burnt
instructions.sk: Pečte 1,5 až 2 hodiny alebo kým fazuľky nebudú veľmi tmavé a chrumkavé, ale nie spálené
instructions.ja: 1時間半から2時間、またはインゲンが非常に濃い色でパリパリになるまで焼く（焦がさないように注意）

instructions.en: Remove from the oven and immediately sprinkle with salt to taste
instructions.sk: Vyberte z rúry a ihneď posypte soľou podľa chuti
instructions.ja: オーブンから取り出し、すぐに好みの量の塩をふりかける
